com.espertech.esper.eeutil.client.debug

Class DebugClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.eeutil.client.debug.DebugClient

  • public class DebugClient
extends java.lang.Object
    EPL Debugger API.

    Use isDebugEnabled() to determine whether debugging is enabled.

    Debugging requires the esper-instrumented-version.jar in classpath (before esper-version.jar). Debugging also requires the Kryo library (kryo-version-all.jar) in classpath. There is no Esper configuration required for debugging.

    Start a debug session using startSession(com.espertech.esper.client.EPServiceProvider, java.io.File) making sure your application also ends the session using DebugClientFileSession.endSession().

    Only a single debug session per engine instance is allowed to be open at any given point in time.

      Start a debug session for the given engine and recording traces to the provided file handle, with default options.
      static DebugClientFileSession startSession(EPServiceProvider engine, java.io.File traceFile, DebugClientOptions options)
      Start a debug session for the given engine and recording traces to the provided file handle, with default options.

        Start a debug session for the given engine and recording traces to the provided file handle, with default options.
        Parameters:
